tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE womens_education (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    education_level VARCHAR(255),
    scholarship_awarded BOOLEAN,
    scholarship_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE scholarships_awarded (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    scholarship_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    recipient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    year INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE womens_education (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    degree VARCHAR(50),
    graduation_year INT,
    scholarship_awarded BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE scholarships (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    scholarship_type VARCHAR(50),
    recipient_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    awarded_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE education_progress (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    scholarship_id INT,
    progress_percentage DECIMAL(5, 2),
    date_updated DATE
)

CREATE TABLE gender_gap_progress (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    year INT,
    gender_gap_percentage DECIMAL(5, 2),
    target_completion_date DATE
)
